text:
Remember Clawdbot? 

It’s now Moltbot and it’s a security nightmare. 

Researchers found it’s vulnerable to indirect prompt injection.

A hacker can send you an email, the AI reads it, and boom..
It executes commands on your Mac.

AI trading experiment ends in total failure. 

Entrepreneur Kevin Xu gave an clawdbot  full access to his crypto portfolio to hit a $1M goal.

 Despite trading 24/7 with dozens of strategies, the algorithm lost every cent.

 A reminder that code can't replace market intuition.

「工具推荐」

之前看到有人把Clawdbot接入飞书干活，今天看到阿里云和腾讯云上有类似的教材，这下满足某些老板希望有7x24h不停转的牛马而且不会抱怨的要求。

钉钉搭建Moltbot（Clawdbot）牛马教程

help.aliyun.com/zh/simple-appl
ication-server/use-cases/quickly-deploy-and-use-moltbot
…

ADHD過ぎてclawdbotでカスの秘書が爆誕した
